text: The Neptune Factor is a 1973 American science fiction movie directed by Daniel Petrie and stars Ernest Borgnine, Yvette Mimieux, Walter Pidgeon, Stuart Gillard. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:1970s family movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American family movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian family movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Daniel Petrie Category:Movies set in Nova Scotia
title: The Neptune Factor
